segments.text: I am currently the highest bidder for your shirt . I was wondering about the size .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How is the condition ? How old is it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It has never been worn . It was too small for me so I'm selling it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why didn't you return the shirt or exchange it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I got it as a gift so I couldn't take it back . Good luck ! I hope it will fit you !
segments.speaker: S2
